{{Multiple issues|advert=June 2010|notability=June 2010|unreferenced=June 2010}} {{Infobox film | name = When Puppets and Dolls Attack! | image = | caption = DVD cover | image_size = 250px | director = [[Charles Band]] | producer = Charles Band | starring = [[Tim Thomerson]]
[[Debra Mayer]]
[[Tracy Scoggins]] | writer = Charles Band | music = [[Richard Band]] | cinematography = | editing = | distributor = [[Wizard Entertainment]] | released = | runtime = 3 hours | country = [[United States]] | language = [[English language|English]] | budget = | preceded_by = | followed_by = |}} '''''When Puppets and Dolls Attack!''''' is a [[DVD]] containing clips of kills from every [[Full Moon Features]] film about killer puppets, dolls, etc. ==Clips== The box set includes the clips from the following movies: * ''[[Puppet Master (film)|Puppet Master I]]'' * ''[[Puppet Master II]]'' * ''[[Puppet Master III: Toulon's Revenge]]'' * ''[[Puppet Master 4]]'' * ''[[Puppet Master 5: The Final Chapter]]'' * ''[[Curse of the Puppet Master]]'' * ''[[Retro Puppet Master]]'' * ''[[Demonic Toys]]'' * ''[[Dollman vs. Demonic Toys]]'' * ''[[Blood Dolls]]'' * ''[[Totem (film)|Totem]]'' * ''[[RagDoll]]'' ==Featured characters== ===''Puppet Master''=== [[Andre Toulon]]
